entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
